name: Mobile Browser Tab Color
author: Matthew Backlas

sections.description: Changes color of tab UI in supported mobile browsers. Option is under ‘Settings’ -> General.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

Where is the option to change the color?

Option is under ‘Settings’ -> General

short_description: Changes color of tab UI in supported mobile browsers. Option is under 'Settings' -> General.
description: Changes color of tab UI in supported mobile browsers. Option is under ‘Settings’ -> General.
